description: Generates and refines music style tags based on lyrics with artificial/robotic emphasis

chunks.prompt:
TASK: Generate music style tags (NOT lyrics, NOT text)

Based on these song lyrics:
{input_text}

Generate ONLY music style descriptors with ARTIFICIAL/ROBOTIC emphasis:

Categories to include:
- Genre: synthpop, electropop, electronic, industrial, math rock
- Vocals: vocoder, autotune, pitch-shifted, robotic voice, synthetic voice
- Instruments: synthesizer, drum machine, sequencer, electronic beats, digital
- Production: artificial, synthetic, processed, glitchy, lo-fi, mechanical
- Mood: cold, algorithmic, precise, mathematical, experimental

FORMAT: Comma-separated tags ONLY. No sentences, no lyrics, no explanations.

EXAMPLE OUTPUT:
synthpop, vocoder, robotic voice, drum machine, artificial, glitchy, cold, mathematical

YOUR OUTPUT (tags only):
